name: USGhostAdventures
skdetail:

Invocation Name: ghost adventures
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to a professionally narrated ghost story. Just say Alexa, open Ghost Adventures. 

Take a tour through the United States, learning history, geography, and more through ghost stories told by professional narrators.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
